knimeNode.name: Brat Document Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes input documents to a Brat supported format to a local or remote file location.

fullDescription.intro:
This node takes the documents in the selected column and writes them, each as two files (.txt and .ann), into the selected directory. The .txt file will contain the document text, and the .ann file the terms and tags in the document. Both files will be named after the table's row keys. The created files can then be imported into the annotation tool Brat.
Note for file name: Some special characters, such as /, \, ?, *, :, <, >, ", | will be rejected. For Windows platform, a name that resembles any forbidden windows filename will also be rejected. For more information about the forbidden windows filename, please check the Microsoft website.
fullDescription.option: Specify prefix for the file name (optional).
Specify suffix for the file name (optional).
